dct_title_s: Kharitat khutut al-bas fi Baghdad wa dawahiha.
dct_description_sm: Iraq. Directorate General of Passenger Transportation Service. Title translation: [Map of bus lines in Baghdad and its suburbs]. Scale on map is stated as 1:20,000. The graphic scale is 1:33,333. Relief is shown by hachures. Transportation map showing bus route name, length, and distance. Verso: Khutūt al-bāsāt fī Baghdād. Iraq. Directorate General of Passanger Transportation Service. Iraq. Mudiriyat Maslahat Naql al-Rukab al-'Ammah. Title translation: [Map of bus lines in Baghdad and its suburbs]. Relief is shown by hachures. Scale is stated on map as 1:20,000. However, the graphic and map scale is 1:33,330. Verso: Khutut al-basat fi Baghdad. [Bus routes of Baghdad}are located, Routes length is given.
dct_publisher_sm: Baghdād : Mudīrīyāt Maslahat Naql al-Rukāb al-'Āmma 1964.
